CustomField.formula: (Gross_Monthly_Income__c + Other_Income__c + Net_Profit_Sole_Trader__c + Director_s_Emoluments_Director__c + Share_of_Profit_Partnership__c + Share_of_Profit_Shareholder__c + Pension__c + Existing_Real_Estate_Rental_I__c) - CASE(Primary_Source_of_Income_List__c, "Gross Salary and Allowances", Gross_Monthly_Income__c, "Other Income (Bonuses, Gratuities, Dividends, Performance-Based Incentives, Alimony, Remittances)", Other_Income__c, "Net Business Income - Sole Trader", Net_Profit_Sole_Trader__c, "Director's Emoluments - Director", Director_s_Emoluments_Director__c, "Net Business Income - Partnership", Share_of_Profit_Partnership__c, "Net Business Income - Company Shareholding", Share_of_Profit_Shareholder__c, "Pension", Pension__c, "Property Rental", Existing_Real_Estate_Rental_I__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Total Other Income
